TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MutexAccessRule extends System.Security.AccessControl.AccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class MutexAccessRule Inherits AccessRule

summary.span: Represents a set of access rights allowed or denied for a user or group.

span.span: Represents a set of access rights allowed or denied for a user or group.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是一組.NET Framework 提供用於管理 Windows 存取控制安全性上具名的系統 mutex 的類別。The class is one of a set of classes that the .NET Framework provides for managing Windows access control security on named system mutexes. 如需這些類別和其基礎的 Windows 存取控制結構的關聯性的概觀，請參閱。For an overview of these classes, and their relationship to the underlying Windows access control structures, see . > [!NOTE] > Windows 存取控制安全性是有意義，只會針對具名的系統 mutex。Windows access control security is meaningful only for named system mutexes. 如果物件都代表本機 mutex、 存取控制是不相關。If a object represents a local mutex, access control is irrelevant. 若要取得目前套用至具名 mutex 的規則清單，請使用方法來取得物件，然後再使用其方法，以取得的集合物件。To get a list of the rules currently applied to a named mutex, use the method to get a object, and then use its method to obtain a collection of objects. 物件不會將使用基礎的判別存取控制清單 (DACL) 中存取控制項目一對一。 objects do not map one-to-one with access control entries in the underlying discretionary access control list (DACL). 當您取得的所有存取規則集的 mutex 時，集合會包含規則目前表示所有存取控制項目所需的最小數目。When you get the set of all access rules for a mutex, the set contains the minimum number of rules currently required to express all the access control entries. > [!NOTE] > 當您套用和移除規則，就會變更基礎的存取控制項目。The underlying access control entries change as you apply and remove rules. 規則中的資訊可能的話，合併到維護最小的數字的存取控制項目。The information in rules is merged if possible, to maintain the smallest number of access control entries. 因此，當讀取目前的規則清單時，它看起來可能不完全與您加入的所有規則的清單。Thus, when you read the current list of rules, it might not look exactly like the list of all the rules you have added. 使用物件，指定允許或拒絕使用者或群組的存取權限。Use objects to specify access rights to allow or deny to a user or group. A物件一律代表允許存取或拒絕存取，永遠不會兩者。A object always represents either allowed access or denied access, never both. 若要將規則套用至具名的系統 mutex，使用方法來取得物件。To apply a rule to a named system mutex, use the method to get the object. 修改物件使用其方法來新增規則，然後使用重新附加安全性物件的方法。Modify the object by using its methods to add the rule, and then use the method to reattach the security object. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您所做的變更物件不會影響具名 mutex 的存取層級直到您呼叫將更改的安全性物件指派給具名 mutex 方法。Changes you make to a object do not affect the access levels of the named mutex until you call the method to assign the altered security object to the named mutex. 物件是不可變的。 objects are immutable. Mutex 安全性會使用的方法進行修改類別來新增或移除規則; 當您這麼做時，會修改基礎的存取控制項目。Security for a mutex is modified using the methods of the class to add or remove rules; as you do this, the underlying access control entries are modified. > [!NOTE] > Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 不支援同步處理物件的安全性。Security on synchronization objects is not supported for Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立和使用物件。The following code example demonstrates the creation and use of objects. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕各種權限目前的使用者，並顯示規則的結果組。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 此範例會允許新的權限為目前的使用者，並顯示結果，顯示新的權限，系統會合併與現有規則。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等候(藉由呼叫，或方法)，使用者必須擁有存取。To wait on a (by calling the , or method), a user must have access. 藉由呼叫釋放 mutex，方法，使用者必須擁有存取。To release the mutex, by calling the method, the user must have access.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 等候(藉由呼叫，或方法)，使用者必須擁有存取。To wait on a (by calling the , or method), a user must have access. 藉由呼叫釋放 mutex，方法，使用者必須有存取。To release the mutex, by calling the methods, the user must have access. 這個建構函式相當於建立物件，藉由傳遞`identity`至建構函式，並傳遞新建物件建構函式。This constructor is equivalent to creating an object, by passing `identity` to the constructor, and passing the newly created object to the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個建構函式建立物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of this constructor to create objects. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕各種權限目前的使用者，並顯示規則的結果組。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 此範例會允許新的權限為目前的使用者，並顯示結果，顯示新的權限，系統會合併與現有規則。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件是不可變的。 objects are immutable. 您可以建立新的存取規則，代表不同的使用者、 不同的權限，或不同，但是您不能修改現有的存取規則。You can create a new access rule representing a different user, different rights, or a different , but you cannot modify an existing access rule. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示規則中所包含的集合中的權限物件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display the rights in the set of rules contained in a object. 此範例會建立物件、 將規則，允許和拒絕各種權限目前的使用者，並顯示規則的結果組。The example creates a object, adds rules that allow and deny various rights for the current user, and displays the resulting pair of rules. 此範例會允許新的權限為目前的使用者，並顯示結果，顯示新的權限，系統會合併與現有規則。The example then allows new rights for the current user and displays the result, showing that the new rights are merged with the existing rule. > [!NOTE] > 此範例不會附加安全性物件至物件。This example does not attach the security object to a object. 中可以找到附加安全性物件的範例和。Examples that attach security objects can be found in and . [!code-csharp[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.AccessControl.MutexSecurity.AddAccessRule/VB/source.vb#1)]
